title: --Lovely pure font but what the feck is it?--
content:
Hi fellow geeks,

i am trying to id this have found a couple of similar fonts in my library ’politica’ ’pill gothic’ and ’United Sans’ but they are not quite the same.

Any ideas?

Thanks in advance!
